short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Bluesky client that uses OpenGraph tags from your current open tab to post to Bluesky

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
a Bluesky client that allows the user to post from any tab to bluesky using the OpenGraph metadata from the current open tab or simply post to bluesky without URL, with their own input text. 

The extension does not collect any user data, the login information and the app password are only stored locally in the local storage of the browser and is used to authenticate to Bluesky but does not at any point in time get collected by the developer or any other third party. 

If you have any issue head over to the github link and use the issues to report any problem you might have. 

This extension is based on the already published Ograph Previewer https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ograph-previewer/ggcfeakcnodgcmmllfdbmngekljbhiim
